circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
Mr. Healey was a truck driver and he failed to show up for a scheduled run.  His last know location was his residence.  He had parked his trailer at a local truck stop west of El Reno and he kept the tractor at his residence.  When he went missing his tractor was still parked in front of his house.  He had a small dog that always traveled with him everywhere he went, she was still at the residence.  
Healey was a regular at a local Indian Casino in El Reno, Lucky Star, and sometimes bragged about his winnings.  It is unknown if he had been at the casino.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: On 11-29-2011 at 2008 hrs, Timur left Grove alone and went to Tulsa, Oklahoma.  His car was parked at the RiverSpirit Casino for 1 hour, then the car left, and was parked again at the Batman Convenience store, 1444 N Mingo Road, Tulsa, Oklahoma.  Timur has not been heard from since.  Timur is in the U.S. on a Visa from Kazakhsthan and was to be married in February in Russia.  He has not contacted family or his fiance.  All leads have been followed up on and have met with no results.  Timur's GPS shows he did not make any stops between Grove and the RiverSpirit Casino in Tulsa.  There was no video available by the time we learned Timur went to the casino.

notes.description: Airlines checked by ICE agents and his passport was flagged to notify if he tried to leave country so a welfare check could be done.  Was to fly from Tulsa on 12-23-2011 to go back to Russia. Timur never made his flight.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
Last seen at the residence of his ex-wife's parents by his family, i.e., 19 year old son.  Kirt was "on foot" at the time he was last seen at approximately 9:30 pm.

Kirt's cell phone and credit card have not been used since that time.  Also, he has two payroll checks that have not been cashed.  One of the payroll checks is on his person.  He also had his cell phone in his possession at the last time he was seen.  The last incoming call Kirt received was from a blocked telephone number and it was received at 9:19 pm and lasted 3 minutes.  Kirt's phone records show that he called his 16 year old daughter 8:34 pm and 9:03 pm.  The last outgoing call was to his daughter at 9:03pm.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: On November 9, 2019,  a local farmer in Tillman County saw Richard Hitchcock walking in a field northwest of Davidson, Oklahoma. He told the farmer he ran out of gas, and she took him to a store in Davidson and went back to the field to locate his car. She found the car three miles south and 1.5 miles west of Tipton, Oklahoma in a field. Hitchcock got a ride from the store in Davidson, Oklahoma to Grandfield, Oklahoma. He was dropped off at State Highway 54 and U.S. Highway 70 in Grandfield. He was last seen walking south into a field. He has not been seen or heard from since.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: On January 23, 2025, Justin Baker and two of his friends went to Fort Smith, Arkansas to a bar.  In the early morning hours of January 24, 2025 they left the bar in Arkansas and drove back into Oklahoma to Muldrow Bottoms, a local hangout area for 4-wheeling and off-roading.  While driving around in the dark, they drove off the bank into the Arkansas river.  The vehicle ended up in several feet of water.  All three passengers made it out of the vehicle and were attempting to swim back to the bank. Two of the passengers made it back on shore however, Justin Baker did not.

in 1982, Gwendolyn was 16 years old when she was dropped off by her sister at the Grey hound bus station in Oklahoma City, OK. She was to travel by bus to San Bernardino, CA to meet her mother and attend high school. She did not arrive in San Bernardino and has not been seen or heard from again. Law enforcement was contacted in 1982 and declined to take a missing person report. Her mother hired a private investigator and received no results. It is unknown if she got on the Greyhound bus in Oklahoma City when it departed. It is unknown what she was wearing at the time she was last seen.
Last contact was in early 1989.  The details surrounding her disappearance are largely unknown.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Last seen on August 24, 2014.  Murrow's vehicle was found in Dewey County, OK.

notes.description: If you have any information in this case, call the OSBI hotline at 1-800-522-8017

Beeson says Murrow talks to all of his kids several times a day. “The fact that man has not called his kids, if that’s not the biggest red flag I’ve ever seen,” said Beeson.

 Sunday, August 24th is the last time anyone heard from him. He had sent a message to a woman he was seeing, letting her know he was in the Canton area.

 Several days later, Murrow’s pickup truck was found abandoned about four miles west of Canton Lake. “Pulled up in front of, not quite to the cattle guard, about 30 foot off the road, just sitting there locked up, nothing suspicious looking about it,” said Beeson.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
Donna has not been heard from since May 1984.

Donna was 18 when she disappeared from Tahlequah, Oklahoma on May 11th, 1984. She reportedly had met a male from Tulsa who told her she'd be able to get better work if she moved to the city. Donna left in a red four-door 1980 Mercury Monarch with the Oklahoma license plate CZ4818. Donna promised to call her family once she arrived in Tulsa but was never heard from again. The circumstances around her disappearance are unclear and she remains missing. The vehicle has also never been recovered.

vehicles.comment: vehicle is a 4 door Mercury Monarch  Has never been recovered

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
Manuel Salado was a U.S. Army Reservist, who was last seen on October 8, 2007 in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. At the time, Salado had graduated Army Basic Training and returned home to his wife in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. 

Manuel Salado was reported missing after he failed to show up for his weekend Army Reserve Drills. Manuel Salado’s wife, Exondia Jaye Salado said that Manuel had returned from Basic Training, then left several days later and never returned. On October 8, 2007, Manuel Salado had visited a friend and wanted to spend the night at his friend’s house because Manuel was concerned that his wife was trying to kill him. 

Salado talked with his wife on the phone and changed his mind and had decided to returned to his home. Before Exondia was arrested in Florida for the murder of Manuel Salado, she apparently told two friends that she had shot Manuel and put his body in a plastic box. After about a week, she moved the box to a location outside the city and burned it on a grill. A search of her computer revealed searches for How to dismember a human body, recipes for human body consumption, how to build a BBQ pit, and information on how a body decomposes. Exondia was found guilty and sentenced to life in prison with no parole, but Salado’s remains have never been found. 

Exondia's defense attorney argues that Salado moved to the Dominican Republic where he is now, living with another woman.

Manuel Salado was 34 years old at the time he went missing in 2007. Manuel Salado has brown hair and brown eyes. If you have any information about the whereabouts of Manuel Salado, contact the Oklahoma City Police Department at 405-297-1126.

notes.description:
If you have any information about this case, please feel free to submit a tip to Crimestoppers anonymously. You can also submit an anonymous text to 405-415-5666 Your ID will remain anonymous.

You can also submit a tip online using this form: https://www.tipsubmit.com/WebTips.aspx?AgencyID=491

My uncle attended a family reunion at my residence in Mannford, Oklahoma, during the month of June. He left after the reunion and no one heard from him again. He called his mother, my grandmother, every year for her birthday; he never called again. He lives a transient lifestyle; working off the grid, taking a bus from one city to the next. He wasn't married and we don't know of any children he may have had. No one in the immediate family or extended family has heard from him since then. He is tall - at least 6' or 6'2, and very doubtful by maybe 5'11". He has brown hair and either brown or hazel eyes. He is very slender, weighing around 170 to 190 soaking wet. We do not know if he had any tattoos and he was in the military.
